button_style: background-color: #4CAF50; /* Green */ border: none; color: white; padding: 10px 20px; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; margin: 4px 2px; cursor: pointer; border-radius: 5px;

body.subject: New Job Order Created
body.message: A new job order has been created. Please review it at your earliest convenience.

body.subject: Job Order Updated
body.message: A job order has been updated. Please check the details.

body.subject: Job Order Rejected
body.message: A job order has been rejected. Please review the rejection remarks.

body.subject: Job Order Approved
body.message: A job order has been approved. You can proceed with the next steps.

body.subject: New Test Order Created
body.message: A new test order has been created. Please review it at your earliest convenience.

body.subject: Test Order Completed
body.message: A test order has been completed. Please check the results.
